property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Tag Team. Put 1 random card from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Tag Team. Your opponent overturns 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Tag Team. You may put 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal; if you do, draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Tag Team. Draw up to 2 cards: put 1 card from hand on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Tag Team. Your opponent may discard 1 card; if he does not, he overturns 3 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Tag Team. Shuffle up to 2 maneuvers from your Ringside into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Tag Team. During your turn when this card is in your Ringside, you may discard 3 cards: put this card into your hand. Draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Tag Team. Draw up to 1 card, and your opponent discards 1 card; when you have at least 5 maneuvers with 'Requirement: Tag Team' in your Ring, double those numbers, and this card is a Trademark instead.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Tag Team. Your opponent discards 4 cards and overturns 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Antic: Search your Arsenal for 1 non-Superstar-specific Unique card, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle. Reversal: -5F; when Revolution Good Luck With That! is in your Ring: -10F instead. When you are a Revolution Superstar and have a non-Revolution card in your Ring: this card is also 'Reversal: non-Unique Superstar-specific maneuver.'

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Pre-match Capacity is +1. You may put your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal: draw the same number of cards +1. When any player moves cards from his Ringside with a non-Superstar-specific Revolution card not in Ringside, those cards are chosen randomly instead. When any player moves a card from Ringside to his hand with its own effect, he cannot move non-Superstar-specific cards from his Ringside to his hand with that card's own effect for the rest of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When packing this card: you cannot pack Revolution Theodore Long is In My Corner! When you have 5+ lower Fortitude, you may put this card from your Ring into your Ringside to reverse a card with Momentum: overturn 3 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Successfully play a Revolution card with blank text: draw up to 2 cards and put 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal. All players' Revolution Off Your Mark cards and cards with 'Defense' in the title are +5F and blank, and when that player has greater Fortitude, they are an additional +5F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Pre-match Capacity is +1. During your turn, when you have successfully played a non-Unique maneuver and it is reversed from Arsenal, you may put this card into your Ringside: your turn continues, your next card played this turn can only be a Follow-up maneuver, and after its damage is applied, end your turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Pre-match Capacity is +1. Your Revolution Outmaneuver and Revolution You Telegraphed It cards are F: 0. No player may play a Revolution Pre-match card with the same title as a card in their Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Pre-match Capacity is +1. Your Revolution Outmaneuver and Revolution You Telegraphed It cards are F: 0. All players' Revolution 4ever: No Mercy cards are blank.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Pre-match Capacity is +1. Your Revolution Outmaneuver and Revolution You Telegraphed It cards are F: 0. All players' Revolution Hardcore Hell cards are blank.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Pre-match Capacity is +1. Your Revolution Outmaneuver and Revolution You Telegraphed It cards are F: 0. All players' Revolution You're Drafted cards are blank.

card.name: Revolution Luck Is On MY Side!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Revolution Good Luck With That! is in your Ring. Overturn 1 card; when the reversed maneuver was a Mean, overturn 1 additional card, and when it was a Colossal, overturn 2 additional cards. Your opponent shuffles the reversed card into his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: printed Legend This card is -#F (where # is equal to your opponent's Fortitude and your Superstar value combined, and cannot be more than 15). Shuffle up to 3 non-hybrid maneuvers from your Ringside into your Arsenal and draw up to 1 card.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Hardy Boyz, Jeff Hardy, Matt Hardy, Kofi Kingston, Rey Mysterio, Seth Rollins, Charismatic Enigma, The Ultimate Survivor, Team X-Treme

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You can pack this card regardless of Superstar. Your Extreme: Follow-up: Maneuver cards are now Follow-up: Card instead, and when your antic with 'high flyer' in the text is unsuccessful, overturn 3 less cards for not playing a maneuver. When your logo is on this card: your Pre-match Capacity is +1, you are considered an Extremist for your non-reversal card effects, and your Superstar-specific antics are considered to have 'high flyer' in the text.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Revolution Incredible High Flyers is in your Ring. When this card is reversed from hand or Backlash, you may discard 1 card: put it in your Backlash instead. When your logo is on Revolution Incredible High Flyers: put up to 1 Follow-up with a title not in your Ring from your Ringside into your hand, and when this card is in your Ring, your Mid-match Capacity is +1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Revolution Incredible High Flyers is in your Ring. When the reversed card is a Trademark, your opponent shuffles it into his Arsenal instead. When your logo is on Revolution Incredible High Flyers: draw up to 2 cards; when it is not: overturn 3 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Revolution Incredible High Flyers is in your Ring. Put up to 1 non-Unique card from your Ringside into your hand. When your logo is on Revolution Incredible High Flyers and this card is in your Ring, once during each of your turns you may discard 1 card: draw up to 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Revolution Incredible High Flyers is in your Ring. Put up to 1 Follow-up with a title not in your Ring from your Ringside into your hand and draw up to 1 card. When your next card played this turn is a Follow-up, you may ignore the Follow-up. When your logo is on Revolution Incredible High Flyers and your next card played this turn is a Follow-up, it is +3D and when you have lower Fortitude: it has Momentum.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Revolution Incredible High Flyers is in your Ring. When this card is in your Ring, and you successfully play a Follow-up maneuver and do not have another card with that title in your Ring, your opponent discards 1 card. When your logo is on Revolution Incredible High Flyers: put up to 2 cards from your Ringside into your hand and up to 2 cards from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Big Show, Christian, Jack Swagger, Kurt Angle, The Largest Athlete in Sports Entertainment, The Leader of the Peepulation, William Regal, Your Freaking Hero

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You can pack this card regardless of Superstar. When your logo is not on this card, you have greater Fortitude, and you play a Mid-match reversal: discard 1 random card. When your logo is on this card: your Pre-match Capacity is +1 and you may ignore the Requirement on your Revolution Overexposure when you do not have a card with that title in your Ring.

card.name: Revolution Extremely Popular With The Peeps!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Revolution WWE's Extremely Charismatic Wrestlers is in your Ring. End your turn. During your opponent's next 2 turns, reduce the number of cards drawn from his maneuvers and antics to 0. When your logo is on Revolution WWE's Extremely Charismatic Wrestlers: you may play this card from Ringside, and when successfully played, put up to 1 non-Superstar-specific 4D- card from his Ring to his Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Revolution WWE's Extremely Charismatic Wrestlers is in your Ring. Put up to # cards from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal, where # is the number of Follow-ups and cards with 'extreme' in the title in your Ring. When your logo is on Revolution WWE's Extremely Charismatic Wrestlers: this card is a Trademark: Colossal instead.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Revolution WWE's Extremely Charismatic Wrestlers is in your Ring. Discard up to 3 cards: draw the same number of cards +2. When your logo is on Revolution WWE Extremely Charismatic Wrestlers and your next maneuver is an Extreme: Follow-up: Maneuver, ignore the Follow-up, and when it is successfully played, search your Arsenal for 1 Extreme: Follow-up, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Revolution WWE's Extremely Charismatic Wrestlers is in your Ring. Draw up to 1 card, and when your next card played is an Extrene: Follow-up: ignore the Follow-up and it is +3D. When your logo is on Revolution WWE's Extremely Charismatic Wrestlers, you may discard 2 cards: look at your opponent's hand and choose 1 card: he discards the chosen card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Revolution WWE's Extremely Charismatic Wrestlers is in your Ring. Antic: Your opponent discards 1 card and overturns 2 cards. When your logo is on Revolution WWE's Extremely Charismatic Wrestlers, search your Arsenal for 1 Extreme: Follow-Up, Assault, or Hold; reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle; when it is your next card played: ignore the Follow-up.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Brock Lesnar, Beast Incarnate, Mark Henry, Great Khali, Test, Umaga

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You can pack this card regardless of Superstar. Draw up to 1 card. When your logo is printed on this card: you are a Powerhouse. When you are a Powerhouse: look at the top 5 cards of your Arsenal: put them in any order on the top and/or bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Revolution WWE's Powerhouses is in your Ring. Your Pre-match Capacity is +1. When your opponent plays a non-Superstar-specific maneuver and you have lower Fortitude, put this card into your Ringside: blank his card until the end of the turn, overturn cards equal to his card's printed Damage, and end the turn; when you are a Powerhouse: put up to 1 of the cards overturned for this effect on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Revolution WWE's Powerhouses is in your Ring. Search your Arsenal for up to 2 non-Unique non-reversal maneuvers, reveal them, put them into your hand, and shuffle. When you are a Powerhouse: this card has Momentum, and when this card is in your Ring, your Mid-match Capacity is +1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Revolution WWE's Powerhouses is in your Ring. Your opponent discards 3 cards. When you are a Powerhouse and play this card as a Counter, ignore the Follow-up; when successfully played, search your Arsenal for 1 Unique card, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Revolution WWE's Powerhouses is in your Ring. When you are a Powerhouse, choose one: shuffle up to 5 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal; or when your first card played during your next turn is a non-Unique maneuver, it has Momentum.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Revolution WWE's Powerhouses is in your Ring. Discard 2 random cards: search your Arsenal for 1 non-Unique maneuver, 1 non-Unique antic, and 1 non-Unique reversal; reveal them, put them into your hand, and shuffle. When you are a Powerhouse: your next card played this turn is -5F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns you may overturn 3 cards: put up to 1 card with 'Requirement: Tag Team' from your Ringside in your hand. You are a Tag Team. You cannot pack Corners.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are Revolution The Shield: discard 2 cards, put up to 2 cards from Ringside on top or bottom of your Arsenal, draw up to 3 cards, and your opponent discards 1 card. Reversals to your Trademarks and maneuvers with 'Requirement: Tag Team' deal no damage.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played after a maneuver with 'Requirement: Tag Team', or when you are not a Tag Team: cannot be reversed from Backlash.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: During your turn when this card is in your hand, you may discard it, draw up to 3 cards, and put 2 cards from hand on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle up to 3 non-reversal cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Antic: -5F and when successfully played, shuffle up to 6 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal. Draw up to 3 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are Revolution The Shield: this card is -#F, where # is your opponent's Superstar Value. Put up to 3 cards from your Ringside into your hand. Your next non-unique maneuver played this turn has Momentum.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you completely reverse a maneuver, choose one: draw up to 1 card, or you may search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique non-hybrid maneuver with printed damage equal or less than the reversed card, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle. You are a Tag Team. You cannot pack Corners.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw up to 1 card. Your opponent puts his hand on the bottom of his Arsenal and draws the same number of cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is -1F for each reversal in your opponent's Ring. When this card is in your Ring, your maneuvers and Superstar-specific cards are -5F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent puts 1 random card from his hand on the bottom of his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Trademark: -9F. Reversal: put 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Trademark: -7F. When you are Revolution Luke Harper, this card is also 'Reversal: Extreme'.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have 20+ greater Fortitude: you win the game via Pinfall Victory.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Overturn 3 cards and then draw up to 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent puts 3 random cards from hand on the bottom of his Arsenal, and all players draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw up to 3 cards and shuffle up to 3 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring and you use your Ability, you may discard 2 cards and ignore 'non-Unique' in your Ability.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Colossals are -1F for each Core or Superstar-specific card in your Ring. Your Cores are +1D for each Colossal in your Ring. You are a Powerhouse.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to 3 cards from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal: draw the same number of cards +1. Your Revolution European Uppercut cards are +4D and Colossals instead.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Overturn 1 card, and then shuffle up 1 to card from your Ringside into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring, it is considered to also be a Colossal and a Core.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played after a Core: cannot be reversed from Backlash.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Discard up to 3 cards: your opponent overturns double that number of cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle up to 3 Cores and up to 3 Colossals from your Ringside into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Choose one: Your next Colossal played this turn is -8F, or your next Core played this turn has Momentum.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns you may put 1 card from your hand and up to 1 non-reversal card from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal: your next Colossal played this turn is -3F (-6F when you have no non-Revolution cards in your Ring). You are a Powerhouse. You cannot pack Corners.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Fortitude Rating is 8 or lower: your non-F: 0 Cores are F: 0. Once during each of your turns when your Fortitude Rating is 8+, you may discard 1 Core: draw up to 1 card.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Mid-match: Antic: Follow-up: Colossal / Reversal: Non-unique Antic

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an antic, when you have 5+ lower Fortitude: ignore the Follow-up on this card, it has Momentum, and this card is -#F, where # is your opponent's Fortitude Rating. Your next card played this turn has Momentum. When successfully played: draw up to 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When reversed from Backlash: put this card into your hand instead. Your opponent discards 1 random card and overturns 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent discards 1 card. When successfully played and damage has been applied, you may discard 2 cards: damage and effects are applied again as if this card was successfully played.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your opponent is a Tag Team or has a Corner in his ring: +10D.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have higher Superstar Value: -5F. Search your Arsenal for up to 1 card, put it in your hand, and shuffle.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for 1 Colossal, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle. When you have 10+ greater Fortitude: your next maneuver played this turn has Momentum.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Before your Draw Segment, you may look at the top 7 cards of your Arsenal: put 3 of those cards on the bottom of your Arsenal and the other cards on top of your Arsenal in any order, then overturn 1 card. Your Revolution Inverted Jackhammer cards are not Follow-ups and they have blank text. You cannot pack Corners.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You start the game, regardless of your opponent's card effects. When you have 7+ lower Fortitude: he cannot play Mid-match reversals to your maneuvers with 'spear' or 'hammer' in the title.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are Revolution Goldberg: -10F and this card can only be reversed by Unique reversals. Draw up to 1 card, shuffle up to 7 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal, and your opponent discards 3 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When Revolution Goldberg's Spear is in your Ring: this card has Momentum.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are Revolution Goldberg: this card is also 'Reversal: Action'. Your next maneuver played is -7F and has Momentum.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are Revolution Goldberg: -7F. Antic: Draw up to 3 cards and your opponent overturns 7 cards. Reversal: -7F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Discard 1 card and put up to 7 cards from Ringside into your hand. When this card is in your Ring, your opponent's cards are -3D.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns, you may overturn 3 cards (when you have have fewer cards in hand, 2 cards): draw 1 card. When packing non-Revolution cards: you can pack Matt Facts.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Superstar Value is +1 and your Pre-match Capacity is +1. When you are Revolution Matt Hardy: you are an Extremist and when you play an Extreme: Follow-up, you may discard 2 cards and ignore the Follow-up, and when it is successfully played, shuffle 1 non-reversal card in your Ringside into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by Revolution Matt Hardy. Successfully play a non-Backlash Matt Hardy-specific card: put up to 1 non-reversal card from your Ringside on top of your Arsenal and up to 1 card from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal. Replace the 'actions' text with 'actions and antics' on your Matt Facts.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are Revolution Matt Hardy: this card has Momentum. Your opponent puts 1 card from hand on the bottom of his Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are Revolution Matt Hardy: this card is also 'Reversal: Hold or Action' and when it is successfully played, draw up to 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are Revolution Matt Hardy: cannot be reversed from Backlash. Put up to 3 cards from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Trademark: -10F and when successfully played, draw up to 1 card. When you are a Revolution Superstar: this card is also 'Reversal: Grapple'.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Trademark: -5F and when successfully played, your opponent discards random 1 card. Your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: hen you are Revolution Matt Hardy and have a non-Revolution card in your Ring: this card is also 'Reversal: Maneuver.' Put up to 1 card from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw up to 1 card, and when you are Revolution Matt Hardy: shuffle up to 1 card from your Ringside into your Arsenal and put up to 1 card from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns when you successfully play an antic, choose one: search your Arsenal for up to 1 non-unique Core, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle; or discard 2 cards and then put up to 1 non-unique Colossal from your Ringside into your hand. You cannot pack Extremes or Corners.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Successfully play a non-Unique Core: search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique non-hybrid antic, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle. When this card is in your Ring, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside: discard your hand and put the same number of cards discarded from your Ringside into your hand.

card.name: Revolution Hulkamania Runs Wild On You

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for up to 2 cards, reveal them, put them in your hand, and shuffle. Your next card played this turn has Momentum.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal and Ringside for Revolution Hulkamania Leg Drop, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle. Your next card played is -10F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played after a maneuver: this card has Momentum. When you are Revolution Hulk Hogan: this card can only be reversed from Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Antic: Draw up to 2 cards and your opponent skips his next turn. Reversal: When played, his maneuver is blank until the end of the turn. Your next card played can only be reversed from hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw up to 2 cards and look at your opponent's hand. When you are a Revolution Superstar, choose 1 card in his hand and he discards the chosen card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle up to # cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal, where # is the number of Superstar-specific cards in your Ring. When you are a Revolution Superstar, # is double the number of Superstar-specific cards in your Ring, but cannot be greater than 12.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns you may discard 2 non-action Backlash cards: your next non-unique maneuver played this turn is -8F. Your We Face Each Other as God Intended is blank, and your Obey reads 'Reverse any card.' You cannot pack Corners, Extremes, High Risks, or Frankie Takes Ho-llywood.

card.name: Revolution The 8th Wonder of the World

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are not a Revolution Superstar: overturn 8 cards. Before the first turn of the game, put any number of cards from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal: draw up to the same number of cards -1 and then put up to 1 non-unique card from your Ringside into your hand. When you successfully play an Andre the Giant-specific card without Momentum: put up to 1 Backlash card from your Ringside into your Backlash.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to 8 cards from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal. When you are Revolution Andre the Giant and your opponent ends his turn without attempting to play a maneuver: he overturns 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, you may overturn 8 cards: this card has Momentum. When you have 8+ lower Fortitude: this card is -8F and has Momentum.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may put your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal: draw up to 8 cards.

card.name: Revolution Giant Boot to the Face

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are Revolution Andre the Giant: your opponent discards 8 cards.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Trademark: Colossal / Reversal: Throw or Extreme

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are Revolution Andre the Giant, this card is in your Ring, and your opponent plays a non-Superstar-specific card with Momentum, you may overturn 8 cards: that card loses Momentum.

card.name: Revolution The Original WWF Hall of Famer

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to # cards from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal, where # is the number of cards in your Ring with 'Giant' in the title. Successfully play a card with 'legend' in the title or text: put up to 2 cards that do not have 'defense' in the title from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns you may discard 2 cards: put up to 1 non-unique non-hybrid Revolution maneuver from your Ring into hand. When your maneuvers would become Multi, they are +3D instead. You cannot pack Corners or Extremes.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your maneuvers without 'reversed' in the text are -1F for each Ultimate Warrior-specific Revolution card in your Ring. When your maneuver moved from your Ring this turn with your Ability is unsuccessful, you may put it into your hand instead.

card.name: Revolution Warrior's Dash to the Ring

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are Revolution Ultimate Warrior, before the first Draw Segment of the game you may put this card from your Backlash into your Ring: draw 3 cards and your opponent discards 1 random card. During your turn when this card is in your Backlash or Ring, you may put it into your Ringside and draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card cannot become Multi. Trademark: -2F. Reversal: -2D.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card cannot become Multi. Trademark: -4F and when successfully played, draw up to 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you discard this card for your Ability: put it on the bottom of your Arsenal instead and draw up to 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal and Ringside for Revolution Warrior's Ultimate Splash, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played after a maneuver: Your opponent discards 3 cards.

card.name: Revolution The Power of the Warrior

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for 1 maneuver of the same type as the reversed card, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played after a maneuver: this card has Momentum. Search your Arsenal for 1 card, put it in your hand, and shuffle. Your maneuvers are +2D.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you successfully play a card with 'classic', 'sleeper', or 'drop' in the title: put up to 1 non-reversal card from Ringside into your hand. When you successfully play an antic: put up to 1 card with 'classic', 'sleeper', or 'drop' in the title from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Choose one: Draw 2 cards or your opponent discards 1 random card. When your antic is unsuccessfully played and you overturn cards for not playing a maneuver, you may put any non-reversal cards overturned on the bottom of your Arsenal instead.

card.name: Revolution Old School Before Old School Was Cool

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to 3 cards from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal: draw the same number of cards +1. When you are Revolution Rowdy Roddy Piper and you have lower Fortitude: ignore the 'can be reversed...' text on your maneuvers with 'Classic' in the title.

card.name: Revolution Piper's Thumb to the Eye

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Trademark: Discard up to 2 cards: your opponent discards the same number of cards +2.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Trademark: -10F and when successfully played, your opponent discards 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are Revolution Rowdy Roddy Piper: this card is also 'Reversal: Card That Cannot Be Reversed'.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Discard any number of cards: put up to that number of maneuvers from Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle up to 6 cards from Ringside into your Arsenal, and then draw up to 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you would discard a card, you may discard a Revolution card from your Backlash instead. You can pack Triple H and Shawn Michaels Arsenal maneuvers, except Revolution Smacked with the Sledgehammer; you cannot pack Corners. When packing non-Revolution cards: you can pack non-Virtual Shawn Michaels and Triple H Backlash cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When Revolution The Degenerates is in your Ring, your Pre-match Capacity is +1, and when you successfully play a card with 'Degenerates' in the text, your opponent overturns 2 cards. Your Revolution Bow to the Masters is -6F. When you are Revolution DX and a non-Revolution card is in your Ring: ignore the Follow-up and 'Can only be played...' text on your Superstar-specific cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw up to 2 cards and put up to 1 card with 'Degenerates' in the text from your Ringside into your hand. You may put 1 non-Unique card from your Ring into your Ringside; if you do, put 1 card in your opponent's Ring with Damage equal to or less than the Damage of the card removed into his Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you would discard any number of cards, you may instead overturn twice that many cards. You can pack Kane and Undertaker Revolution maneuvers; you cannot pack Corners.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When Revolution Attitude Adjusters is in your Ring, your Pre-match Capacity is +1, and when you successfully play a card with 'attitude' in the text, put up to 2 cards from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal. Once during each of your turns, when your card with 'attitude' in the title is unsuccessful, you may overturn 3 cards and your turn continues; you can only play maneuvers for the remainder of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have 6+ lower Fortitude: this card is -6F and has Momentum. Antic: your next maneuver played this turn has Momentum. When this card is in your Ring, your Superstar-specific maneuvers are -6F. Once during each of your turns, when this card is in your Ringside, you may discard 2 cards and put it in your Backlash.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your first card played during your turn is reversed, you may overturn 3 cards and continue your turn; if you do, you can only play a printed Follow-up card, ignore the Follow-up, and after damage is applied from that card, end your turn. You can pack Jeff Hardy and Matt Hardy maneuvers; you cannot pack Corners.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your opponent plays a Mid-match reversal to your printed Follow-up: he discards 1 random card. When he reverses your printed Follow-up, you may put this card into your Ringside and then put 2 non-hybrid maneuvers from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Antic: -3F, draw up to 3 cards and shuffle up to 3 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal. During your turn when this card is in your Ring, you may shuffle it into your Arsenal: put up to 1 card with 'Team X-Treme' in the title from your Ringside into your Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When playing a Superstar-specific card, you may discard 1 card: ignore the Follow-up, Requirement, or 'Can only be played after...' text. You can pack Chris Jericho and Big Show-specific maneuvers and non-Backlash antics as if they are not Raw or Smackdown. You cannot pack Corners.

card.name: Revolution Best in the World at What We Do

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Revolution Superstar. Once during each of your turns you may discard 1 Superstar-specific card: your opponent discards 1 random card. When your Superstar-specific card is unsuccessful: put up to 1 non-Unique non-hybrid maneuver from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Mid-match Capacity is +1. This card is -#F, where # is your opponent's Fortitude Rating. When this card is F: 0, he cannot play reversals to it. He puts 2 cards from his hand on the bottom of his Arsenal, and draw up to 2 cards. Replace 'discard' in your Ability with 'draw', and replace 'Big Show' and 'Chris Jericho' in the text of your cards with 'JeriShow'.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns when you successfully play a Extreme, Throw, Foreign Object, or Grapple, you may put 1 card from your Ringside into your hand: overturn 3 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Mid-match Capacity is +2. Overturn 3 cards. When you overturn cards for your effects: put up to 1 random card from Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this is the first card played on your first turn, you may overturn 1 card: this card has Momentum. Put up to 1 card from Ringside into your hand and up to 5 cards from Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Trademark: Mean / Reversal: Throw or Assault

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Trademark: -10F. Reversal: When the reversed maneuver did not have 'bulldog' or 'lariat' in the title: overturn 3 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Trademark: -5F and when played after a Throw or Extreme: cannot be reversed from Backlash.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may put the reversed card into your opponent's Ring instead of his Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Hybrid reversals to your cards with 'plex' or 'choke' in the title deal no damage, and when you have lower Fortitude, those cards cannot be reversed by hybrid reversals. When you have a non-Revolution card in your Ring: your cards with 'plex' or 'choke' in the title are +3D. You cannot pack Corners.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for up to 2 cards with 'plex' or 'choke' in the title: reveal them, put them in your hand, and shuffle. When you are a Revolution Superstar: your opponent discards 1 card.

card.name: Revolution Beat Me If You Can...

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have 10+ lower Fortitude: this card has Momentum. Your next maneuver played this turn has Momentum, and when it has 'plex' or 'choke' in the title, it is -13F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw up to 1 card. During your turn when this card is in your Ringside, you may put it on the bottom of your Arsenal: draw up to 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Trademark: +10D, and when you have 13+ greater Fortitude: this card has Momentum.

card.name: Revolution Survive If I Let You

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Revolution Beat Me If You Can... in your Ring. Antic: Shuffle up to 13 maneuvers from your Ringside into your Arsenal. Reversal: Ignore the Requirement.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Assaults are -2F for each Extreme in your Ringside. Your Extremes are +1D for each Assault in your Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Discard up to 2 cards: draw the same number of cards +1. When you are a Revolution Superstar: your Extremes, Assaults and Foreign Objects are -1F for each Rhyno-specific card in your Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is -1F and +1D for each Assault and Extreme in your Ring.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Trademark: Mean / Reversal: Throw or Grapple

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Trademark: -7F. Search your Arsenal for 1 Assault, Extreme, or Foreign Object: reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Trademark: Colossal / Reversal: Assault or Extreme

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Trademark: -10F, and when played after a Superstar-specific or Colossal: this card has Momentum.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns, put up to 1 non-Multi non-reversal card with 'kick' in the title from your Ring or Ringside into your hand.

card.name: Revolution Backed by The Sinister Minister

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for 2 non-unique maneuvers with 'kick' in the title: reveal them, put 1 in your hand and the other in your Ringside, and shuffle. When you are a Revolution Superstar and your opponent reverses your maneuver with 'kick' in the title from Arsenal: put up to 1 card from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Trademark: Core / Reversal: Assault or Extreme

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Trademark: -4F, and when played after a Follow-Up: this card has Momentum. When you are Revolution Tajiri and have a non-Revolution card in your Ring: this card is 'Reversal: Card' instead.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you moved this card from your Ring this turn: -15D.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card reverses from Arsenal: put it in your Ring instead.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Antic / Reversal: Maneuver with Target 'chest' or 'back'

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Antic: -7F and shuffle up to 2 cards with Target 'chest' and/or 'head' from your Ringside into your Arsenal. When a Core has dealt its Damage to you and is not reversed: you may put this card into your Ringside and end your opponent╞s turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns, you may search your Arsenal for 1 non-Unique non-hybrid card that is a Throw or Extreme, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle: overturn 3 cards. You cannot pack Corners.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Before the Draw Segment of your first turn of the game, shuffle any cards in your Ringside into your Arsenal. Your Mid-match Capacity is +1 for each Revolution Set the Table in your Ring, ignore the Follow-up on that card, and if it is reversed, your turn does not end.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played after a successfully played maneuver: cannot be reversed from Backlash or by hybrid cards from hand. Draw up to 2 cards and then discard 1 card: your opponent discards 2 cards.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Dudley Boyz, Buh Buh Ray Dudley

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played after a card with 'table' in the title: this card is +10D and a Colossal instead. Put up to 1 card from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Trademark: Colossal / Reversal: Throw or Extreme

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Trademark: -10F, and when played after a Colossal or as a Counter (to a Colossal), this card has Momentum.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to 1 maneuver from your Ringside into your hand, and shuffle up to 3 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal; you may allow your opponent to draw 1 card: if you do, shuffle up to 3 additional cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns, when you successfully play an antic, put up to 1 non-Unique card from your Ring on the bottom of your Arsenal. When packing non-Revolution cards: you can pack Stevie Richards maneuvers and reversals. You cannot pack Corners.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for 1 antic, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle. When you unsuccessfuly play an antic and overturn cards for not playing a maneuver: put up to 3 cards from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal. When you have a non-Revolution card in your Ring: replace 'antic' with 'antic or action' in your Ability.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle up to 4 non-hybrid antics from your Ringside into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent overturns # cards, where # is the number of antics in your Ring and cannot be greater than 5.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle up to # cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal, where # is the total number of antics in all players' Rings and cannot be greater than 10.

card.name: Revolution Novamania Runs Wild On You!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your next 2 maneuvers played this turn have Momentum.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have lower Fortitude: -10F. As a maneuver, put up to 2 cards from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal: put the same number of cards from your Ringside into your hand. As an antic, -10F. Shuffle this card and up to 2 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: no Corner in your Ring. Put up to 1 non-reversal card with 'suplex' in the title from your Ringside into your hand: put this card on the bottom of your Arsenal. You have 5+ lower Fortitude: this card has Momentum, and you may play it from Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Pre-match Capacity is +1. During your opponent's turn when he successfully plays a maneuver and you have lower Fortitude, it is not his first maneuver of the turn, and damage has been applied, you may shuffle 3 cards from your hand into your Arsenal: put up to 1 non-hybrid maneuver from your Ringside into your hand and end his turn.

card.name: Revolution Aid From the King's Court

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have 5+ lower Fortitude, this card is -10F. When this card is in your Ring, ignore the Requirement on Revolution All Hail King Booker!, and when you use your Ability and have lower Fortitude, choose one: do not discard, or choose 1 non-reversal Unique card instead.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Pre-match Capacity is +1. When you successfully play an Assault, or when you are a Revolution Superstar and successfully play a Sheamus-specific card: draw up to 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have lower Fortitude or fewer cards in hand: this card cannot be reversed by non-Unique reversals, and as a reversal: F: 0. Put up to 1 card from your Ringside into your hand, and up to 3 cards from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal. Name a Target: this card gains that Target.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played as a Counter, -5F and +5D. Put up to 1 card from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Mid-match Capacity is +1. Search your Arsenal for 1 non-reversal Superstar-specific card, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle. Once during each of your turns when you have greater Fortitude, you may discard 1 maneuver with blank text:

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw up to 4 cards. When you have 10+ lower Fortitude, your Fortitude Rating is 10-, and your maneuver is reversed, you may put this card into your Ring, that maneuver is considered successful, your turn does not end, and your next card played cannot be reversed from hand by non-Unique cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle up to # cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal, where # is equal to 3 + the number of Backlash cards in your opponent's Ringside: draw up to 2 cards. When your next card played this turn is unsuccessful: put up to 1 other card from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to 3 cards from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal and draw the same number of cards +2. When this card reverses from Arsenal, put it into your Ring. When this card is in your Ring, your Revolution Air Kofi is also 'Reversal: Colossal'.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: 5+ cards in your hand and no Corner in your Ring. Can be played from Ringside. Shuffle 4 cards from your hand, up to 1 non-Unique card in your Ring and up to 6 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal: draw up to 7 cards. Your next card played this turn has Momentum.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed by hybrid cards, or from Arsenal by non-Unique cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an antic, shuffle up to 3 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal, and your next card played this turn is -4F and cannot be reversed from Backlash. As a reversal, your opponent discards 1 random card from hand. When successfully played, search your Arsenal for 1 card, put it in your hand, and shuffle.
